content: separation 9 tsuki mountain fibres i 100% that witch sweater #thatwitchsweater yoke part 2 continued sizes 5-9 you will not be separating for sleeves until after the book motif use the word charts from page 8 if you d like other words work chart odd sizes 5 7 9 after finishing the colorwork remove your bor marker knit 14 and place the new bor marker when you ve finished the chart you should have a total of 336 364 420 448 476 stitches cut cc then knit 1 round in mc your yoke should measure 11 for sizes 7-9 if you find that the yoke is too short knit in mc until you reach your preferred yoke depth move onto the sleeve and body separation 10 tsuki mountain fibres i 100% that witch sweater #thatwitchsweater sizes 5-9 chart variations 11 tsuki mountain fibres i 100% that witch sweater #thatwitchsweater sleeve & body separation knit 36 38 43 48 53 58 63 68 73 stitches place 41 50 54 58 62 66 84 88 92 stitches on hold cast on 4 4 4 4 6 6 4 4 4 underarm stitches using the cable cast on knit 71 76 86 96 106 116 126 136 146 stitches place 41 50 54 58 62 66 84 88 92 stitches on hold cast on 4 4 4 4 6 6 4 4 4 underarm stitches using the cable cast on knit to the bor you should have 150 160 180 200 224 244 260 280 300 total body stitches body motif centering sizes 1-4 this is to ensure the book motif is centered to the cf of your yoke not all the books will line up with the words but they will be centered to the center front of your yoke size 1 - after finishing the separation remove your bor marker knit 13 and place a new bor marker knit body chart size 2 - after finishing the separation remove your bor marker knit 5 and place a new bor marker knit body chart size 3 - after finishing the separation remove you bor marker knit 15 and place a new bor marker knit body chart size 4 - after finishing the separation remove your bor marker knit 13 and place a new bor marker knit body chart size 1 & 4 body chart 12 tsuki mountain fibres i 100% that witch sweater #thatwitchsweater size 1 & 4 body chart variations 13 tsuki mountain fibres i 100% that witch sweater #thatwitchsweater size 2 & 3 body chart use the variations from pages 10 & 11 since the book is the same size body knit until the body measures 4 5 6 7 5 12 13 14 15 15 from the underarm or 3 less than desired length keep in mind that these lengths are calculated after the body motifs for sizes 1-4 and the 11 yoke depth for sizes 5-9 make sure to try your sweater on throughout the process to make
